sentence.Network_en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentence.Network_cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentence.Network_en: He keeps forgetting the words and the song is a sprawling mess.
sentence.Network_cn: 他老是忘词，歌被唱得乱七八糟。
我总是忘了现在是12月了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: maybe you have discovered some clever ways to keep yourself from forgetting .也许你发现了什么好方法使自己不忘事。
maybe you have discovered some clever ways to keep yourself from forgetting .也许你发现了什么好方法使自己不忘事。
forgetmenot 勿忘我草属, forgetting 遗忘曲线, forgettable 可以忘记的
forbearance 忍辱forgetting 失念form is emptiness 色卽是空

list.abs: 八年级上册英语语法复习全册 ... stop doing sth 停止做某事 forget doing sth 忘记做过某事 go on doing sth 继续做某事.
欧品乐 - OpinLe ... 密码 password 忘记密码 forget password 下次登录 remember me.
晓美焰_百度百科 ... you are not alone. 你就不是孤身一人 Don't forget 不要忘记 Always. somewhere. 在某个角落始终.
英语中不能直译的句子_小颖_新浪博客 ... We'll see. 再说吧。 Forget it. 算了吧。 Take care. 请多保重。.

entry.def: If you forget something or forget how to do something, you cannot think of it or think how to do it, although you knew it or knew how to do it in the past.

example.ex: Sometimes I improvise and change the words because I forget them...
example.tran: 有时，我临场发挥改了词，因为我把原来的词给忘了。

example.ex: She forgot where she left the car and it took us two days to find it.
example.tran: 她忘记把车子停在什么地方了，我们花了两天时间才找到。

entry.def: If you forget something or forget to do it, you fail to think about it or fail to remember to do it, for example because you are thinking about other things.

example.ex: She never forgets her daddy's birthday...
example.tran: 她从来不会忘记老爸的生日。

example.ex: She forgot to lock her door one day and two men got in...
example.tran: 有一天她忘了锁门，两个男人溜了进来。

entry.def: If you forget something that you had intended to bring with you, you do not bring it because you did not think about it at the right time.

example.ex: Once when we were going to Paris, I forgot my passport.
example.tran: 有一次我们准备去巴黎时，我忘了带护照。

entry.def: If you forget something or someone, you deliberately put them out of your mind and do not think about them any more.

example.ex: I hope you will forget the bad experience you had today...
example.tran: 我希望你不要把今天遇到的倒霉事放在心上。
我无法不去想发生的事。

entry.def: If you forget yourself, you behave in an uncontrolled or unacceptable way, which is not the way in which you usually behave.

example.ex: He was so fascinated by her beauty that he forgot himself and leaned across to touch her.
example.tran: 他为她的美貌所倾倒，以至于忘乎所以地靠上前去触摸她。

entry.tran: 没关系;不必在意;不要再提了
entry.def: You say 'Forget it' in reply to someone as a way of telling them not to worry or bother about something, or as an emphatic way of saying no to a suggestion.

example.ex: 'Sorry, Liz. I think I was a bit rude to you.' —
'Forget it, but don't do it again!'...
example.tran: “抱歉，莉兹。我想我刚才对你有点粗鲁。”——“没关系，但是别再那样做了!”

entry.def: You say not forgetting a particular thing or person when you want to include them in something that you have already talked about.

example.ex: The first thing is to support as many shows as one can, not forgetting the small local ones.
example.tran: 首先要尽可能多地支持演出，这其中也包括当地的小型演出。

auth_sentence.content: Not forgetting Greek, though the influence is subtle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not forgetting Greek, though the influence is subtle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not forgetting Greek, though the influence is subtle.

auth_sentence.content: Very young and people are constantly forgetting that.
auth_sentence.res_content: Very young and people are constantly forgetting that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Very young and people are constantly forgetting that.

auth_sentence.content: My father wasn't just forgetting his keys.
auth_sentence.res_content: My father wasn't just forgetting his keys.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My father wasn't just forgetting his keys.
